name: Dont Get High on your own Supply
name_original: Dont Get High on your own Supply
description:
With the creation of Special Forces, with the maintask to detect and prosecute drug dealers, the illegal drug trade was severely curtailed. The last remaining dealers who have the balls to continue to sell their stuff are being searched everywhere.

In order to eliminate the drug trade for good, the police are ready to do everything necessary to achieve this goal, even if there should be serious casualties.

You are Dimitry Cracknow, a russian Drugdealer. Lacking competition, you see the drug trade as extremely lucrative. With the help of your companion Boris, a trained bear, you take it with every cop that stands between you and your money.

Dont Get High on your own Supply is a Top-Down Survival Shooter.

Your main goal is to sell drugs to customers to earn the big money, which is like a highscore. At the same time try to avoid the bullets of the police otherwise its a Gam Over.

Semesterproject for :
